newsitem.title: USA: Industrial Training changes name to ITC.
newsitem.headline: Industrial Training changes name to ITC.

text.p: Industrial Training Corp said Wednesday it changed its name to ITC Learning Corp.
The company said the name change, effective May 9, 1997, was approved on May 6.

Its acquisition of Comsell Training in 1993 and Anderson Soft-Teach in 1996 helped the company move into the information technology and education industry, which compliments its traditional process and manufacturing markets, it said.
Industrial Training said the new name better describes the company and its focus.
The company continues to trade under the symbol on the Nasdaq market.
